name: beekeeper
description: Service for automatically managing and cleaning up unreferenced data

name: apiary
description: Apiary provides modules which can be combined to create a federated cloud data lake

name: catalyst-render
description: A hapi js plugin that works with catalyst-server to provide server-side rendering with react inside a handlebars template

name: catalyst-server
description: Configuration and composition management for Hapi.js applications.

name: dr-shadow
description: Dr Shadow is a library developed by Egencia (part of Expedia Group) that enables shadow traffic (ie. mirroring). It is a valuable tool for having good hygiene for service operations (ie. testing, resiliency, performance).

name: drone-fly
description: A service which allows Hive Metastore Listeners to be deployed outside of the Hive Metastore Service

name: flyte
description: Flyte binds together the tools you use into easily defined, automated workflows

name: fpsmeter
description: Optimized javascript utility for measuring frames per second in a browser environment. Useful for observing end-user client run-time performance without adversly impacting performance.

name: graphql-kotlin
description: Libraries for running GraphQL in Kotlin

name: haystack
description: Top level repository for Haystack, containing documentation and deployment scripts
